basics.name: Carlos Hernando Quintero Castro
basics.label: Experienced support engineer offering over 2 years of expertise in providing technical assistance for software products and it's integration environments.
basics.summary: Experienced support engineer offering over 2 years of expertise in providing technical assistance for software products. Skilled in supporting customer integration deployed on both cloud and on-site environments, with proficiency in networking and troubleshooting. Proven track record of working autonomously and collaboratively to effectively resolve application-related problems.

summary: Supported software products for banking integrations including the authentication stage according to client policies
Managed customer support tickets on calls, conferences, emails to gather information, validated logs, and diagnosed the issue.

Monitored and Supported cloud environments (AWS) and the on-premises infrastructures where the applications are deployed, to guarantee a secure, updated, and vulnerability-free platform On windows and Linux servers.
Followed security alerts, diagnosed root cause and potential scope of impact.
Created and updated documentation for common issues and recommended troubleshooting processes for product and security alerts.
Implementation of industrial automation systems in up to 40 oil wells.
Digitization of industrial instruments for dashboard monitoring.
Data collection, monitoring, and support of field systems.
Implemented scripts to collect and analyze metrics to measure the performance of the application and reported findings to help make informed business decisions.
Generated reports to clients from the collected data.
Designed and planned home automation systems according to the comfort needs of the customer, from network devices, phones or tablet, and actuators or sensors required.
Installed and configured smart systems on homes and buildings.
Post-sales support of home automation systems for hardware and software.
Trained customers in the use of home automation systems.

education.area: Certification in programming skills with emphasis on mobile applications Misión TIC 2022
